casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ronnie SYLVIA. No. 398P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of August 2006 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
